Galaxy

A Space Invaders Clone

This game is a simple remake of arcade classic Space Invaders. This game was built in 5 days using HTML5, CSS, and JS.

How to Play

Move left and right with the arrow keys, and shoot lasers with the space bar.

Destroy all the aliens to win!

Features

  • Custom game engine that handles physics, animations, and game logic
  • Rendering and animations using vanilla JS and the Canvas API
  • Sounds and music handled by the Howler JS library
Visit this project's github.

Created by Josh Stroud.
